title: FondaMental Advanced Centers of Expertise
description: A network of expert centers dedicated to the assessment and care of patients with psychiatric disorders.
fullDescription: The FondaMental Advanced Centers of Expertise (FACE) is a comprehensive network of specialized centers across France dedicated to improving the diagnosis, treatment, and research of major psychiatric disorders. The network collects standardized clinical, cognitive, and biological data from patients to advance personalized medicine approaches in psychiatry.
objectives: The FACE project aims to standardize assessment procedures across psychiatric centers, create a comprehensive database of patient data, and develop innovative diagnostic and therapeutic approaches based on biological markers and personalized medicine principles.

publications.title: The FondaMental Advanced Centers of Expertise: A Nationwide Network of Expert Centers for the Management of Bipolar Disorders
Personalized medicine approaches in bipolar disorder: The FACE cohort

fundingInfo: Funded by the French National Research Agency (ANR), the Investissements d'Avenir program, and the Fondation FondaMental.

datasets.title: Asperger
datasets.description: Database for autism spectrum disorder study focusing on individuals with Asperger's syndrome

datasets.title: Bipolarity
datasets.description: Comprehensive database for bipolar disorders study examining mood cycles and treatment efficacy

datasets.title: Depression
datasets.description: Database for major depressive disorder research tracking symptom severity and treatment outcomes

datasets.title: Schizophrenia
datasets.description: Comprehensive database for schizophrenia research examining cognitive function and treatment response

title: French Minds Consortium
description: A national initiative to study the genetic and environmental factors contributing to psychiatric disorders in the French population.
institution: French National Institute of Health and Medical Research (INSERM)
objectives: The French Minds Consortium aims to identify genetic and environmental risk factors for major psychiatric disorders through large-scale population studies and advanced genomic analyses.

datasets.title: French Minds Genetics Database
datasets.description: Comprehensive genetic data from participants with various psychiatric conditions

datasets.title: Environmental Factors Database
datasets.description: Data on environmental exposures and life events associated with psychiatric disorders

title: NeuroCog Longitudinal Study
description: A longitudinal study of cognitive changes in psychiatric disorders across the lifespan.

datasets.title: NeuroCog Baseline Assessment
datasets.description: Initial cognitive assessments from participants aged 18-80

datasets.title: NeuroCog Follow-up Data
datasets.description: Longitudinal follow-up assessments at 2, 5, and 10 years

title: Early Psychosis Prevention Initiative
description: A multi-site study focused on identifying early markers of psychosis and developing preventive interventions.

datasets.title: High-Risk Cohort Database
datasets.description: Data from individuals identified as being at high risk for developing psychosis

datasets.title: Psychosis Biomarkers
datasets.description: Neuroimaging and blood-based biomarkers associated with psychosis risk

title: International Mood Disorders Consortium
description: A global collaboration studying the biological basis of mood disorders across diverse populations.

datasets.title: European Mood Disorders Database
datasets.description: Clinical and biological data from European participants with major depression and bipolar disorder

datasets.title: Asian Mood Disorders Database
datasets.description: Clinical and biological data from Asian participants with major depression and bipolar disorder

title: Trauma and Resilience Research Network
description: A research initiative studying psychological resilience factors in individuals exposed to trauma.

datasets.title: Trauma Exposure Database
datasets.description: Data on various types of trauma exposure and associated mental health outcomes

datasets.title: Psychological Resilience Factors
datasets.description: Data on protective factors associated with positive outcomes following trauma exposure
